scripts.deploy:mainnet: graph deploy hangleang/nft-marketplace --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --network mainnet
scripts.deploy:goerli: graph deploy hangleang/nft-marketplace-goerli --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --network goerli
scripts.deploy:mumbai: graph deploy hangleang/nft-marketplace-mumbai --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --network mumbai
